bow: pregnancy has no shame months pregnant there nothing wo eat just now had pickled beets amp fresh cantaloupe last night put canned whipped cream gross on top of cornbread and guess what it was delicious beetroot and melon are regular salad combo are they carry on think both sound reasonable and have been pregnant in years if only it were as dignified as salad sat the jar of beets next to the plate of sliced cantaloupe and picked away at both with fork that reached into the clean dishwasher to get because not going to put away dishes *before* making my snack brilliant salad with some assembly required was all hotdog pizza shameless mmmmm that sounds good can spoon some relish on top of it too used to slather hummus over pizza it still awesome even while not pregnant enjoy finding great combos while you can and best wishes for your upcoming delivery what wrong with canned whipped cream ve just never liked it to me it tastes like plastic compared to real whipped cream but then again pretty much grew up on an english dairy farm but all bets are off when preggo oh and did mention the cornbread was *painfully* stale did slow me down bit pizza with peanut butter instead of tomato sauce thanks ll have to try that it reminds me of coming home drunk at 2am and saying to myself right its time for waffle sandwich with peanut butter maple syrup amp banana my favorite pregnancy dessert one of each these are generally called white pizzas because they do have tomato sauce on the bottom the general rule is that anything that goes together on sandwich will work on pizza or alternately treat it as sort of casserole in my house we make pizza with pesto on the bottom proscuitto fresh tomato and mozzarella everyone favourite based on classic italian sandwich quesadilla pizza salsa on the bottom tex mex cheese and seasoned chicken even as rare treat baked potato pizza mashed potatoes on the bottom bacon onion cheddar cheese it pretty rare for us to have pizza with tomato sauce base tabasco sauce on pumpkin pie is awesome also go to subway and get pizza sub with pick es spinach and pepper jack cheese the guys usually turn green lol just dipped chocolate mint cookie into some mashed potatoes little ashamed haha how was it been hesitant to share with you my biggest guilty pleasure but you all seem so nice amp understanding mash hard boiled eggs into few spoonfuls of creamy blue cheese dressing mix in some pickled beets and then dump it all on top of fresh baby spinach will eat that shit by the pound started doing this in my first trimester and go through bag of baby spinach every days my mouth is watering just thinking about it there is no help for me oh man tabasco on pumpkin pie never would ve thought of that out of pie but have some pumpkin pie ice cream will report back with results if you re ordering in restaurant white pizza usually has white sauce like alfredo would call yours creative pizzas get the pizza sub with pickles and mayo and not even pregnant oh no spread generous amount of hummus over the top of pepperoni pizza from pizza hut was not being anywhere near as creative as your pizza making skills seem to be we do now make our own pizzas from time to time without red sauce on them and they are super fun and yum definitely going to try the baked potato one omg never equated pregnant food with drunk food you are sooooo right well do too they are awesome and like to change it up sometimes with jalapenos or making it like normal sub with lettuce tomato etc the looks get from people is hilarious lol let me know how that turns out might have to check that one out lol that actually sounds delicious and *not* pregnant my craving was nutella and raspberry jam on whole grain toast mmmm oh you mean waffles deluxe had that when pregnant but with nutella instead of the maple syrup that sounds so good wish had weird pregnancy combo to share with you but really just drink gallon of milk every few days which is weird for me considering never drank milk for fun before only dash in coffee love this entire thread when was months preggo everything laid eyes on would give me heartburn but there was time when would have mainlined sour patch kids also chipotle tabasco sauce on butternut squash is delicious did the same thing and found that milk did cause havoc with my digestive system all of sudden during pregnancy and early breast feeding skolled it straight out the bottle not even ashamed my guilty pleasure was vegemite amp jam amp butter on toast still eat it now because damn it delicious sounds like mine yes please aw feel like the only one who did get unusual food cravings good on you my pregnancy combo was matchstick carrots corn and pickled beet salad with thousand island dressing mixed it all up in the morning and by lunch and dinner time it was yummy mixed soggy mess never really crave weird combos during my pregnancies just had food that craved at in opportune times and things did normally eat always hated peanut butter but are it out of the jar with spoon when was pregnant with my oldest also craved sweet gherkins at 3am friend lived with us at the time and thankfully kept odd hours he frequently drive me to the store in the middle of the night to buy them buy few jars and have one gone by the time we got home hey that hella healthy so indulge away tabasco sauce on everything went on spicy bender during my second pregnancy this sounds so freaking good for real not even pregnant and egg blue cheese beet spinach salad sounds ~incredible~ sriracha sauce on cottage cheese and eat this as dip with tortilla chips did this before pregnancy but now that am ca stop deleted not even pregnant and really want to try this with my first son ff refried black beans straight from the can with triscuits and craved wasabi soynuts second son spinach garlic onion and laughing cow chipotle cheese omlette with egg beaters twice week for the whole pregnancy and any kind of nut could shove into my mouth know right eat it straight from the can all the time even when not pregnant been raisin my yr old son up right he baby birds me when he sees me doing it and give him little straight into his mouth too best is if you add squirt of hershey chocolate syrup with it it like chocolate milk shooter think was frat boy in another life and that why have only been gifted with sons oh man coming from someone who is weeks and constantly nauseous made it about of the way down this thread before deciding it was in my best interest to stop reading never had real cravings with either my first or so far into this pregnancy but if you mentioned food had to have it and it amazing how often people talk about pizza and fried food that got expensive does that count when was pregnant my favorite treat was chocolate chip pancakes with ketchup on top yum so far milk toasted pb amp chalupas om nom nom last time it was all onion bagels and clementines my son is months old and swear have more cravings now than ever did while pregnant it is so freaking good too am inexplicably on the gallon of milk day diet ll just have one glass refill ok last one refill walk away sister just walk away high five sounds like heaven knowing me probably eat it too fast to even taste it though hell yes it is and dat vitamin it is truly truly delicious preach it not experiencing so much of having unusual food cravings but rather experiencing the depravity to just eat whatever is nearest to the opening of the fridge the same level of give fuck as when slobbery drunk amp starving at 2am end up making bizarre dietary choices today mid morning snack was leftover mashed sweet potatoes with tofu chicken nuggets ketchup totally counts and absolutely get out of this thread at 9wks maximum levels of nausea going on there my heart goes out to ya sister had bad nausea both pregnancies from wks 20 knew was pregnant when my response to want some of my snickers was nah good 1st trimester was nearly all about food aversions for me all throughout the nausea could eat meat or anything fresh or remotely healthy it had to be high fat high carb which kinda makes sense building the nervous system majority of which is fat be starving and nauseous amp the only thing could stomach was big mac oh and fries yes know its 15 mins out of the way hurry up cuz need to pee again am totally trying this today taco bell is rank amp not to be eaten unless you re drunk or months pregnant with no self respect brb taco bell that what she said not as delicious as it sounds haha feel it wake up in the middle of he night dying of thirst and end up in the kitchen with the whole gallon guzzling away it also works with promite deleted deleted okay went to the store today and definitely bought the ingredients to make this beast of pregnancy meal had to come back and tell you when was pregnant made scrambled hamburger and onions then drizzled honey on it so good the entire time was pregnant never ate pizza without pickles on it sometimes even sweet spicy pickles divine
